name: Association of Financial Guaranty Insurers
goal: AFGI is the trade association for financial guaranty insurers.  AFGI's members include the insurers and reinsurers of municipal, infrastructure, and asset-backed securities (ABS).  AFGI monitors and works to address issues of concern to its members.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: AFGI has monitored and commented on financial regulatory issues, including those relating to derivatives, as well as shadow banking.
